channel.title: Nazi dagger
channel.description:
Well i promised my self that i wouldn't trace my models anymore...but i had to one more time... this is probably my best traced model :D
EDIT:I tried to fix the handle a bit... [size=15pt]EDIT 2: STOP SAYING THIS MODEL IS RACIST!i looked for a dagger on google,and this is what came up. [/size] Edit 3: Im making a V2 soon. Meta: [img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/8407/ndm.png[/img]
DAT:( looks ugly :( ) [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/536/ndd.png[/img]
There's a few glitches in it,but i can fix them.
Also i see that DATmaker makes the colors look different then they appear in meta...

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

And if you insist on bumping it again, stay on topic, I mean, seriously, who gives a fuck about a symbol?
Look at the model as it is, whether there’s a symbol there or not, as zyle said, racism only exists because you people make a big deal out of it.

Stay on topic, not another word about the symbol or the topic will be closed, look at the detail, give constructive criticism, and so on, you’ve been warned.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

zyle1992:

Fucking pussies, stop complaining about a god damn symbol. The only reason racism exists, is because dumbasses like you shamcooly, keep letting it exist by bringing it up time and time again. It’s the Internet yo prick. No one cares about your opinions, your beliefs, or whatever the fuck you want to say. Chances are you wont run into anyone on these forums ever in your life, and if you do, you won’t know it’s them, and they wouldn’t very well admit it if it was them.

Well actually i know the creator of this thread Irl, and why did you have to single me out? You make no sense, it exists because I’m pointing it out?No, It exists because people got the idea that the color of their skin makes them superior to others. I stopped bringing it up, I was the one who tried to go back on topic but people kept continuing this. This is the internet, where people are free to post their opinions, some don’t care and some do. You obviously do care since you posted on the topic, correct? So stop trying to act like an e-thug, and next time, try to have some kind of logic to your post.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

[quote=“Tomkruz, post:20, topic:321580”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=418030.msg3075720#msg3075720 date=1261808842]

if anyone would see you with those in my country,
they’d beat the fucking shit out of you,
nazi’s are gay skin headed fucks,

other then that,
the outline is nice,
but the idea sucks balls

YOU FUCKING RACIST@@#$!@#$#@!$@#%

If he’s racist why are you calling germans skin-headed fucks? Think before you post.

If he’s racist, why is it that when he said “nazi’s are gay skin headed fucks”, you made the assumption that “nazi’s” are all germans? think before you post.
[/quote]

Germans were Nazis.

[quote author=Guardianman5 link=topic=418030.msg3075732#msg3075732 date=1261809768]

if anyone would see you with those in my country,
they’d beat the fucking shit out of you,
nazi’s are gay skin headed fucks,

other then that,
the outline is nice,
but the idea sucks balls

YOU FUCKING RACIST@@#$!@#$#@!$@#%

Yeah, see your country is probably some third-world that nobody cares about. We are not in your country so we can post whatever the ******** we want and be fine. It’s not racist, or anything. It’s just a weapon in a game people, don’t get all psycho over it.

You aren’t cool just because you quoted someone.
[/quote][/quote]
well, first of all, you have no idea what your saying. i’ll admit it, i’m avery sensitive when i comes to WII, i’ve done ALOt of research on it, and my grandparents were in the war, first of all the swastik was either to mean 1 of these 2 things: the circle of life. or: a brocken cross. and yes, even though all this started with hitler in germany, it doesnt mean that all nazi’s are german, in almost every country there’s a den of skin-heads somewhere. oh and when you say that my country is a third party country, then your a fucking bitch who has a flacid asshole thinking it’s your dick. my country is where WWII fucking began bitch, in poland, although i don’t live there, i know a shit load of history, i’m only prejudice against the prejudice. anywyas, i bet you live in some low down fucked up country where your parents are hard labour workers who spend all they’re savings on your “precious” internet.

end of flame.

and yea, paragraphing flames are most effective CJ xD

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @DivineScape DivineScape
item.description:
@DivineScape wrote:

Lol @ Everyone, I’m 99.9% sure that everyone on this forum isn’t a Nazi, anyone that is German on these forums, I doubt were alive when Hitler killed millions of Jews, maybe their great grandmother, if she’s still alive. But no. No one on these forums were involved in killing millions of jews, so please stop the flame war. You’re acting like a bunch of hippies going like “OMFG OMFGOMFG STOP THE HATE NERD GERMANS LOLOLOLOL”. If you’re going to keep flaming the Germans, then go back to living in your mothers basement, and go back to thinking aliens are real.

My point is made, if someone tries to flame me, or quote me and then say something bad, then you’re a idiot, and you deserve to have your account removed from these forums.

Edit: If you’re going to say I’m German, and I’m trying to support what Hitler did, then you’re a freakin’ idiot. I’m 100% Irish.

Edit2: XD I forgot to rate, I’ll give it a 8.5/10, I think the edges need fixed up a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:13, topic:321580”][quote author=shamcooly link=topic=418030.msg3074260#msg3074260 date=1261704664]

You’re being over sensitive. Yea, its not necessarily appropriate, but its not appropriate to flame him. its not his design. he liked the dagger, so he made it. lets not start a flame war. Plus, he made the model, this doesnt mean he believes in what Hitler did. He’s not necessarily being ‘racist’, which is not even a correct term. Judaism is not an ethnic background, its a religion. Therefore, how is it racist? it may be a little prejudice, but that just shows that you’re overly sensitive. Im german, im not offended by this. know why? because this doesnt affect me. I dont see anyone in here saying “FUCK YOU GERMANS!!!”, so how can you other german people be offended either? nobody is saying “Fuck the jews”, so the jews should stop being over sensitive. we all know what happened in the past, so why not be like Kenny Hotz and make fun of it?

One, Jews were not the only people targeted during the halocaust. Two, most neo-nazis believe that the white man is superior, and all other races are not. He Created an item with this symbolism on it and releasing it to other people, and that is a way of supporting it. If you didn’t believe in it why would you go through the trouble of making it and posting it? And at your last sentence, why would you make fun of the slaughtering of millions of innocent people, their suffering, and their tears? It’s something immature little kids make fun of, and idiots. It may have happened in the past, but history has the tendency to repeat itself, so lets not make fun of this type of thing, because it can happen again.
[/quote]
I understand what your saying, and towards the last sentance, with the Kenny Hotz comment, i mean that we need to be less sensitive and offended by it. We all know it happened. We know it was horrible. We need to stop dwelling in the past. The meaning behind the swastika shoulda have died along with hitler, as his way of thinking, as we know, was wrong. I misspoke, I didnt mean so much as ‘make fun of’ but more of ‘lighten the mood’. Lets end this now. no more spam. Those who want to dwell on the past, go for it. Those of us who want to accept the past, learn from it, and live their life with one less depressing memory, by all means do so.[/quote]

The nazis still exsist today, they just don’t have as much power. And about the model, I think the hilt of the dagger is way too flat, and the actual blade could be a little thicker. Also if you have a logo right above the hilt, there’s no need to put it on the hilt too. Other than that and the nazi symbolism, good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi dagger
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:13, topic:321580”][quote author=shamcooly link=topic=418030.msg3074260#msg3074260 date=1261704664]

You’re being over sensitive. Yea, its not necessarily appropriate, but its not appropriate to flame him. its not his design. he liked the dagger, so he made it. lets not start a flame war. Plus, he made the model, this doesnt mean he believes in what Hitler did. He’s not necessarily being ‘racist’, which is not even a correct term. Judaism is not an ethnic background, its a religion. Therefore, how is it racist? it may be a little prejudice, but that just shows that you’re overly sensitive. Im german, im not offended by this. know why? because this doesnt affect me. I dont see anyone in here saying “FUCK YOU GERMANS!!!”, so how can you other german people be offended either? nobody is saying “Fuck the jews”, so the jews should stop being over sensitive. we all know what happened in the past, so why not be like Kenny Hotz and make fun of it?

One, Jews were not the only people targeted during the halocaust. Two, most neo-nazis believe that the white man is superior, and all other races are not. He Created an item with this symbolism on it and releasing it to other people, and that is a way of supporting it. If you didn’t believe in it why would you go through the trouble of making it and posting it? And at your last sentence, why would you make fun of the slaughtering of millions of innocent people, their suffering, and their tears? It’s something immature little kids make fun of, and idiots. It may have happened in the past, but history has the tendency to repeat itself, so lets not make fun of this type of thing, because it can happen again.
[/quote]
I understand what your saying, and towards the last sentance, with the Kenny Hotz comment, i mean that we need to be less sensitive and offended by it. We all know it happened. We know it was horrible. We need to stop dwelling in the past. The meaning behind the swastika shoulda have died along with hitler, as his way of thinking, as we know, was wrong. I misspoke, I didnt mean so much as ‘make fun of’ but more of ‘lighten the mood’. Lets end this now. no more spam. Those who want to dwell on the past, go for it. Those of us who want to accept the past, learn from it, and live their life with one less depressing memory, by all means do so.[/quote]

Paragraphing in flame wars is much more effective.

Anyway, the model looks rather pretty, I like.
Handle looks very thin though, try make it more cylindrical.

Read full topic
